title: Requires the posting of a statement of wage rates and supplements; provides penalties for failure to do so
summary: Provides that the failure of a contractor or sub-contractor on a public works project to post a statement of wage rates and supplements shall be subject to prosecution as a misdemeanor and subject to a civil penalty of not less than five hundred nor more than one thousand dollars; provides for the maintenance and production on the job site of "sign-in" and "sign-out" sheets upon the request of the fiscal officer.
